title: ActivePrime
author: ActivePrime
content: Hello,I'm trying to mine zil as second currency but I am unsuccessful since 7-8 months. First I've tried with ETH not with RVN using different pools but still no success.After all the handwork now I seek support to make it work. I am sharing you the the dropbox link of some screenshots because I can't attach them on the forum.SS Link https://www.dropbox.com/sh/mz1qto6y7umvm6x/AACM7TtFg6SbykYG7IzeVfmma?dl=0Thank You all for your help!

comments.author: ZeeeN
comments.body: what card and mining program you use.

comments.author: ActivePrime
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeeN on December 18, 2022, 07:17:24 PMwhat card and mining program you use.You can see all this information on screenshots, that is the same reason why I attached them.But.....2x 5600XT1x 5700XTHiveOSAll Settings and Miner Info in Screenshots please open that DB Link

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: Quote from: ActivePrime on December 19, 2022, 01:02:19 AM please open that DB LinkNO! link could be anything.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: JayDDee on December 19, 2022, 01:24:23 AMQuote from: ActivePrime on December 19, 2022, 01:02:19 AM please open that DB LinkNO! link could be anything.I took the risk and opened it in a virtual machine running Redhat Linux,so far the only things I see are the 4 pictures which the author claimed to have attached,probably because he does not know how to add links in the forum as I see he is a newbie.If it has some CMD script which run in Windows I don't know as I don't try these links in a Windows machine but from a Linux perspective the link looks clean.Nevertheless OP if you want to mine go to ezil.me and there you have everything explained how to dual mine zilliqa.

comments.author: ActivePrime
comments.body: NO! link could be anything.[/quote]Are you from this world ? to protect you there is antivirus which probably you are not using.Those picture show what am i doing and what me current setting are.

comments.author: ActivePrime
comments.body: Nevertheless OP if you want to mine go to ezil.me and there you have everything explained how to dual mine zilliqa.[/quote]I've tried everything and that's why I need help, i don't want to mine ETC+ZIL, ETHW+ZIL or anything similar. I'm mining RVN on https://rvn.2miners.com and want to additionally mine ZIL (any pool) along with RVN.I need you to help me out if I am doing something wrong by checking my current setting and let me know the changes required.On ezil site I've tried everything but it didn't worked for me.Thank you!

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: Quote from: ActivePrime on December 19, 2022, 06:05:50 PMAre you from this world ? to protect you there is antivirus which probably you are not using.Those picture show what am i doing and what me current setting are. I don't know about the world you're in but I don't click on random links. Antivirus is a joke, especially in mining.If you insist on posting a link make sure the file name is not obfuscated and the file type is clearly visible.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ActivePrime on December 19, 2022, 06:05:50 PMAre you from this world ? to protect you there is antivirus which probably you are not using.It's 2022 and almost 2023 and people still use AVs? Why bother with an antivirus, yet you can keep your computer super clean by not visiting and downloading from random links?Quote from: ActivePrime on December 19, 2022, 06:05:50 PMThose picture show what am i doing and what me current setting are. The much preferred method is taking a screenshot and upload it to one of the popular image hosting sites like Imgur or imgBB and then share the link in the OP. Open-source screen capturing software programs like sharex can make the job easier.

comments.author: ActivePrime
comments.body: I highly appreciate your teachings about attaching the screenshot, most forums I use have option of attaching images or files but this one not. I'll keep in mind about hosting image sites in the future.This thread is not to teach me how to attach an SS to this forum instead I seek help mining ZIL with my existing RVN (2miners) setup. If you need more information about my settings please let me know but please stop the conversation about attaching SS to this forum.Using HiveThank you!

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Hive OSHow to Dual Mining Ravencoin+Zilliqa after ETH mergehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MKYodXGeH6cVWindowsHow To Dual Mine RVN + ZIL - Ravencoin + Zilliqa Mining - TeamRedMinerhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3CZrHsIJB4MPost your screenshots via Imgur or imgBB and I'll try to see what your problem is. There shouldn't be any big problems with building according to the video guide.

comments.body: If you look at end of video , Its MSOS minerstat tutorial.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jql2_j264Nw
